name: Davidduc's apartment 23 Tay Ho
address: 23 Tay Ho, Tay Ho District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Located in Hanoi, this air-conditioned apartment is 1.1 km from Phu Tay Ho. The apartment is 2.1 km from West Lake. Free WiFi is offered .

The kitchen features a fridge. Towels and bed linen are provided in this self-catering accommodation.

Tran Quoc Pagoda is 2.3 km from Davidduc's apartment 23 Tay Ho, while Quan Thanh Temple is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 17 km from the property.
